alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 3:06PM CST until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Rock Island, Henry IL and Whiteside Counties. Rock River at Moline affecting Rock Island and Henry IL Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River at Moline. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.2 feet, Water affects 60th Street south of John Deere Road in Moline and 56th Ave from Green Valley Park 48th St. Water is on Canal Road in Big Island. Smith`s Island is affected by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 13.4 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
